medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Mount Matterhorn
description: village in a valley near mountains; church with other stone buildings and a stream near center; golden rolling hills with shrubs in foreground and LL; rising golden bluff in background with towering blue and white mountain behind
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
